text: Donna Reed (born Donna Belle Mullenger, January 27, 1921 - January 14, 1986) was an American actress. She was born in Denison, Iowa. Reed had a major role in It's a Wonderful Life. She won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in From Here to Eternity. She won a Golden Globe Award for Best TV Star - Female for her central role in The Donna Reed Show. She died of pancreatic cancer in Beverly Hills, California. == Other websites == * * * Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles County, California Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1921 births Category:1986 deaths
title: Donna Reed
